title: Inquiry-Based Social Education Scenario Development: Utilizing Formative Assessment and Scientific Ability Evaluation Criteria

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science methodologies and comprehension of inquiry processes
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based social studies projects requiring real-time collaboration and feedback using mobile devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply formative assessment strategies when developing inquiry-based educational scenarios
Learners can provide step-by-step feedback during the inquiry process using scientific competency rubrics
Learners can establish design and implementation plans for social studies inquiry projects in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
